Articles.Content: SWEET MOTHER OF RONALD MCDONALD!! How did you get that thing into space??!

"a ship from the 21st century gaurding the skies of planet kerbin"

~Captain Jack Harkness

in doctor who "the sound of drums"
Bloody hell! That's a SHIP! GIMME THE FILE!
Now all we need is the Enterprise and the SDF-1 Macross and were all good here

I might try to build the SDF-1 Macross, the exterior armor is going to take me forever to get right though, also, the centre of mass for the ship.

Why don't we have a thread for people to put the spacecraft they built based on Sci-fi?

EDIT: I got bored and decided to build the inner frame of it, tried using fuel tanks, insanely frustrating so I'm using DSM's strut fuel tanks to build the frame.

Edited September 17, 2012 by Whatshtisthis

Uchuu Senkan Yaaamaaatooo!

I LOVE THAT ANIME! Both the new and the old, you my friend are a god, please please give us the .craft files

I might try to build the SDF-1 Macross, the exterior armor is going to take me forever to get right though, also, the centre of mass for the ship.

Why don't we have a thread for people to put the spacecraft they built based on Sci-fi?

EDIT: I got bored and decided to build the inner frame of it, tried using fuel tanks, insanely frustrating so I'm using DSM's strut fuel tanks to build the frame.

If such a thread should come to exist, i would finish my reproduction of Serenity. It's not exactly done yet, and would have to be modded for the vtol engines and ip drive and such, but hey, I want it to be something both Jebediah and Wash could fly.

Edited June 19, 2013 by meatballcannon
deplorably wrong spelling
Let's see this thing versus Macey Dean's Battlecruiser. Cuz I want to see the Yamato shred that thing with shock cannon fire.
Necro!!!! Go back to the dead with you!!!!
This thread has come from the void to haunt us yet again.
